title: simple_quarto_website
text:
about myself (h2)
I studied Computer Science and Information at Xi’an Jiaotong-Liverpool University from 2021 to 2023. In the autumn semester of 2023, I transferred to the University of Liverpool and obtained a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science in July 2025. This autumn, I came to Georgetown University in the United States and enrolled in the DSAN program. Since I was a child, I have been fascinated by data and have been eager to explore and solve complex problems in the real world through data science and artificial intelligence methods.

Technical Implementation Details (h3)

basketball

Curry won the NBA championship in 2015.

Code
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np


x = np.linspace(0, 10, 100)
y = np.sin(x)

plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
plt.plot(x, y, 'b-', linewidth=2, label='Sine Wave')
plt.title('Mathematical Function Visualization')
plt.xlabel('X values')
plt.ylabel('Y values')
plt.grid(True, alpha=0.3)
plt.legend()
plt.show()
